text: Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Haze. Force 2 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Temperature falling slightly. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Mainly cloudy. Force 4 to 5 easterly winds with gusts.
Mainly cloudy. A few light rain patches. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds, occasionally force 5.
Cloudy. A few rain patches. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds, becoming northerlies.
Temperature falling. Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. A few rain patches at first. Force 3 to 5 northerly winds with gusts.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
